page.title: 08Keeping a dog.
page.content: Our dog is a{Doberman.}He has a large chest. We bought him as a six week old puppy. He is a softy. My uncles dog is called Rocky, he is Don's son and is{black and tan.}He was born in Hyde which is near Stockport. He is separated from Don.He stays at our house all day for five days a week. When he was small he had most of his{tail cut}off at the vets. Then he came to ouyr house to live in our downstairs washroom which was an ideal size. Next he went to live in the boxroom, upstairs and now he{lives in {the kitchen. Don is very jealous,Rocky bites and nips Don who gets annoyed and then tells Rocky off.
